data.name: kstidMultiUserCantEditWs
data.value: You will not be able to change properties in writing system {0} because the active project is not on your local computer ({1}). To make changes, open project {2} on computer {3}.
data.comment: Message for message box that is displayed when user tries to access the writing system properties dialog while connected to a project not on this computer.

data.name: kstidWordInitial
data.comment: Displays in Context column of Valid Patterns tab in Punctuation dialog box

data.name: kstidTreatAsSymbol
data.comment: Context menu item for the valid characters grid on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidQuotationMarksIncompleteMsg
data.value: Both the Opening and Closing quotation marks must be specified for level {0}.
data.comment: Message for message box that is displayed when user enters an incomplete pair of quotation marks.

data.name: kstidValidCharsOtherHdg
data.comment: Heading for the valid characters list on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidQuotationMarksGapMsg
data.value: Level {0} is empty and may not be followed by a level that is not.
data.comment: Message for message box that is displayed when user enters an incomplete pair of quotation marks.

data.name: kstidCustomQuotationMarksName
data.comment: Name of the custom entry in the list of quotation mark languages.

data.name: kstidMatchingPairsErrorCaption
data.comment: Caption for message box that is displayed when user enters an incomplete matching pair.

data.name: kstidWordMedial
data.comment: Displays in Context column of Valid Patterns tab in Punctuation dialog box

data.name: kstidQuotationMarksErrorCaption
data.comment: Caption for message box that is displayed when user enters an incomplete pair of quotation marks.

data.name: kstidPageTooSmall
data.value: The selected page size is too small to print the report. Please choose a larger size.
data.comment: Message displayed when printing a report from one of these dialog boxes: Problems with Footnotes or Pictures Customized Styles not Updated (very unlikely the user will ever see this).

data.name: kstidValidCharsNumbersHdg
data.comment: Heading for the valid characters list on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidTreatAsWrdForming
data.comment: Context menu item for the valid characters grid on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidQuotationPairFormat
data.comment: Format string of a pair of opening and closing quotation marks.

data.name: kstidMissingNonSpaceQuotationMarkMsg
data.value: Quotation marks must contain at least one non space character.
data.comment: Message displayed when quotation marks were entered that contain all spaces.

data.name: kstidQuotationSetFormat
data.comment: Format string for showing two pairs of quotation marks, the primary pair and the secondary pair.

data.name: kstidNoTokenOccurrencesCount
data.comment: Text displayed in the count column of the punctuation patterns grid on the Punctuation dialog when there are patterns to display, but a data source hasn't been read.

data.name: kstidIsolated
data.comment: Displays in Context column of Valid Patterns tab in Punctuation dialog box

data.name: kstidWordFinal
data.comment: Displays in Context column of Valid Patterns tab in Punctuation dialog box

data.name: kstidRemoveValidChar
data.comment: Context menu item for the valid characters grid on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidQuotationMarkOpenerIsCloserInOtherLevelMsg
data.value: Cannot use the same quotation mark as the opening in level {0} and the closing in level {1} Quotation mark: {2}
data.comment: Message for message box that is displayed when user enters some invalid quotation marks.

data.name: kstidTreatAsPunct
data.comment: Context menu item for the valid characters grid on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidNoProjectBackupsFound
data.comment: Displays in Restore a Project dialog box if no project backup files are found in the default backup folder (this is an unusual scenario).

data.name: kstidMatchingPairsErrorMessage
data.value: Both the Open and Close values for a matching pair must be specified.
data.comment: Message for message box that is displayed when user enters an incomplete matching pair.

data.name: kstidPuncPatternTipSpaceReplacment
data.comment: Text displayed in a tooltip for the punctuation patterns tab on the punctuation dialog. When the tooltip is showing the Unicode values for a punctuation pattern, this replaces any Unicode values for space.

data.name: kstidValidCharsWordFormingHdg
data.comment: Heading for the valid characters list on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidQuotationLangAltNameFmt
data.comment: Format string for language names that have alternate quotation systems. These names are displayed in the drop-down of the quotations tab on the punctuation dialog.

data.name: kstidUnicodePointFormat
data.comment: Used to format strings that display Unicode codepoints (e.g. Punctuation dialog box.

data.name: kstidTreatAsOther
data.comment: Context menu item for the valid characters grid on the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidWordBreaking
data.comment: Displays in Context column of Valid Patterns tab in Punctuation dialog box
